summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2641 for the improvement of the Alley in Block 26, C. D. Boren's Addition to The City of Seattle, all in the City of Seattle, by paving with brick, under Ordinance No. 31033, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
